dmca.title: DMCA Issue - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: erik@biglion.com [mailto:erik@biglion.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2006 8:53 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com;
legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Issue - Copyright Infringement
Importance: High


It has come to my attention that two websites hosted on your servers are
illegally using my copyrighted materials. Please shut the offending sites
down immediately. A copy of the following DMCA complaint form has been
attached for your records.
 

Erik Vogel

47 Winslow Lane

Smithtown, NY 11787

January 31, 2006

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Attn: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel 
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Dear Mr. Poletes,

 

Please remove the infringing content of http://www.netshome.com
<http://www.netshome.com/>  AND http://www.bestupdate.com
<http://www.bestupdate.com/> 

 

The copyrighted works at issue are the websites located at
http://www.biglion.com <http://www.biglion.com/>  and
http://www.onlinestoresmall.com <http://www.onlinestoresmall.com/>  and all
their internal pages.



1.                  Infringing Web Pages: The entire website at
http://www.netshome.com <http://www.netshome.com/>  is a direct copy of my
website http://www.biglion.com <http://www.biglion.com/>  and the entire
website at http://www.bestupdate.com <http://www.bestupdate.com/>  is a copy
of my former site at http://www.onlinestoresmall.com
<http://www.onlinestoresmall.com/>  which has since been closed.

 

2.                  My Contact Information:  <mailto:erik@biglion.com>
erik@biglion.com



3.                  Infringer's Contact Information: (Taken from the Whois)
netshome.com
Wisner, Janet info@netshome.com
6500 Castlewood Dr. #601
Carroll, Ohio 43112

bestupdate.com
Reeves, Melvin info@bestupdate.com
2509 N. Campbell #276
Tucson, AZ 85719

 

4.                  I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

5.                  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information
in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

 

 

Sincerely,



Erik Vogel, Partner

BigLion.com

Phone: 631-724-6475

Email: erik@biglion.com
